definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: In part, because of the quality of social relationships.
sentences.chinese: 部分原因出在社會關係的品質優劣上。

sentences.english: Online photo sharing website but based on your real-life social network.
sentences.chinese: 根據你的現實社會關係來在線分享照片網站。

sentences.english: This is the least mysterious as it concerns solely social relations and logistics.
sentences.chinese: 這一點鮮有神祕感，因爲它僅僅涉及社會關係和物流。

sentences.english: He believed that social relations inevitably followed the path of economic progress.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲，社會關係不可避免要遵循着經濟發展的規律。

sentences.english: He did not have a silver spoon or the right connections.
sentences.chinese: 他並非含着金鑰匙出生的，也沒有社會關係。

sentences.english: The research indicates a sea change in social relations.
sentences.chinese: 該研究顯示出社會關係的一個巨大變動。

sentences.english: The weakness of Human nature and social relationships all insinuate some human limitation.
sentences.chinese: 人性弱點和社會關係無不隱射出人的某種侷限性。

sentences.english: After operating for a decade, we have established good social relations in Beijing, as well as an outstanding and united management team.
sentences.chinese: 我公司在京發展已經有十年，擁有良好的社會關係。

sentences.english: The clearest health benefit of social relationships comes from being involved with and helping others.
sentences.chinese: 社會關係的最清晰的健康功效來自關心和幫助別人。

sentences.english: And no species is more intricately and deeply social than humans are.
sentences.chinese: 而且沒有哪種生物的社會關係比人類更加複雜和精密。

sentences.english: Human societies, though, are more complex than mere dyads.
sentences.chinese: 然而人類社會關係遠比兩兩之間更爲複雜。

sentences.english: But build your network with the right motivation.
sentences.chinese: 但是構築社會關係網絡的動機要純。

sentences.english: Cooperation in building estrade reveals the network of social relationship between villagers.
sentences.chinese: 合作修建臺子的過程，體現了村民的社會關係網絡。

definition: socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
